history.proof: intros n m p H1 H2. qsimpl. hfcrush use: N.compare_gt_iff, N.mul_lt_mono_pos_l unfold: N.gt.

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H1 : n > m H2 : p > 0 Unable to unify "(S (?M1410 * ?M1412) <= ?M1411 * ?M1413)%nat" with "(p * n ?= p * m) = Gt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m, p : N H0 : (p ?= 0) = Gt H2 : (n ?= m) = Gt Unable to unify "(S ?M1811 <= ?M1810)%nat" with "(p * n ?= p * m) = Gt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall n m : nat, N.of_nat n > N.of_nat m -> (n > m)%nat n, m, p : N H0 : (p ?= 0) = Gt H2 : (n ?= m) = Gt Unable to unify "(?M2071 ?= ?M2070) = Lt" with "(p * n ?= p * m) = Gt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall n m : nat, N.of_nat n > N.of_nat m -> (n > m)%nat n, m, p : N H0 : (p ?= 0) = Gt H2 : (n ?= m) = Gt Unable to unify "(?M2331 ?= ?M2330) = Lt" with "(p * n ?= p * m) = Gt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H : forall n m : nat, N.of_nat n > N.of_nat m -> (n > m)%nat n, m, p : N H0 : (p ?= 0) = Gt H2 : (n ?= m) = Gt Unable to unify "(?M2591 ?= ?M2590) = Lt" with "(p * n ?= p * m) = Gt".

ctx: intros n m p H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: In environment H1 : forall n m : nat, N.of_nat n > N.of_nat m -> (n > m)%nat n, m, p : N H0 : (p ?= 0) = Gt H2 : (n ?= m) = Gt Unable to unify "(?M2851 ?= ?M2850) = Lt" with "(p * n ?= p * m) = Gt".

original: intros n m p H1 H2. apply Nat.mul_lt_mono_nonneg. - apply gt_Ngt. apply N.gt_lt. apply N.gt_lt. auto. - apply N.gt_lt. auto. - apply N.gt_lt. auto. - auto.
